title: Calories in Spicy McChicken
meta_description: Discover calories in spicy McChicken, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, and quick tweaks for McDonald's menu item.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Spicy McChicken sandwich: crispy chicken patty, lettuce, spicy mayo on sesame bun; values based on official data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; McDonald's values may updateâ€”check app or packaging for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Spicy McChicken sandwich contains about 410 calories and 14 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with McDonald's info.

faqs.q: How many calories in one spicy McChicken?
What's the protein in spicy McChicken?
faqs.a: About 14 g of protein from the chicken patty.

faqs.q: Does spicy McChicken have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 650 mg due to seasoning and sauce.

faqs.q: How do carbs break down in spicy McChicken?
faqs.a: 40 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 5 g sugars, mostly from the bun.

faqs.q: Is spicy McChicken higher in calories than regular?
faqs.a: Similar to regular McChicken at ~400 kcal; spice adds minimal calories.
